manufacturer: Shenzhen KeYi Interactive Robot Co., Ltd.
description: Compact, lightweight analog water level sensor that detects trace amounts of water droplets using a series of parallel wires. Features low power consumption, high sensitivity, and direct analog output for microcontroller integration.

other: User‑friendly design: half‑moon slip handle depression

pins.Data: Analog output (connect to Arduino analog pin)

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect VCC to 5 V, GND to ground, and the sensor’s analog output to an Arduino analog input (e.g., A1).

example_code.explaination: This Arduino sketch reads the analog value from the water sensor. If the value exceeds 700, it turns on an LED to indicate water presence; otherwise, the LED stays off. The sensor value is also printed to the serial monitor.

company_info.name: Shenzhen KeYi Interactive Robot Co., Ltd.
